column4: has anyone tried the 185 or 190 nvidia restricted drivers yet on karmic?  it never installs fully for me in hardware drivers and i just end up going back to 185 drivers.
not tried em.. BUT why install new ones if the old ones didnt break ? i still get great FPS in tf2 / steam games..
what game is tf2?  and when play even simple games such as tuxracer taxes the video card like crazy, and it's not that old of a laptop video card.  geforce 7150
